issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Parquet data source does not support complex types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4863](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4863). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once ARROW-4466 is merged, I would like to add support for reading parquet files that contain LIST and STRUCT.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4863?focusedCommentId=16793120) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is a fairly tricky task (we still don't have this fully done in C++). I'm moving to 0.14 as I expect it to take a little time

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4863?focusedCommentId=17239954) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~andygrove]`  I'm going through old PRs and closing them. The writer will support nested types to our heart's content, would we need to do anything further to enable this in DataFusion, or can we close this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4863?focusedCommentId=17240024) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Thanks [~nevi_me] I filed https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10761 for the work we need to do in DataFusion

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4863?focusedCommentId=17332023) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/39

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4863?focusedCommentId=17332276) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/83
